mapper.select: select lower(column_name) AS "name", lower(data_type) AS "type", lower(data_length) AS "length", lower(data_precision) AS "precision", lower(data_scale) AS "scale", lower(nullable) AS "nullable" from user_tab_columns where table_name= upper(#{tableName})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_dict ( id, value, label, type, description, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{value}, #{label}, #{type}, #{description}, #{sort}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_dict SET value = #{value}, label = #{label}, type = #{type}, description = #{description}, sort = #{sort}, parent_id = #{parentId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks =#{remarks} WHERE id=#{id}
